name: 2Shot
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Shoot your way to higher scores and let recoil take you further in this platformer prototype. You only got two shots in the air.

Created for Trijam #137 - [Theme: Big guns].

Engine: GameMaker Studio 1.4.

Time: 03:00:00.

The development was really clutch time-wise so gameplay is pretty basic. Enemies can't hurt you but you can shoot them to get score bonuses!

Controls:

  • A-D to move.
  • Spacebar to jump. (Realease it to adjust your jumps)
  • Mouse left button to shoot. (Shoot down after jumping to go higher)

I might update this game periodically so stay tuned!
